text: Sick Abed is a 1920 American silent comedy movie directed by Sam Wood and was based on the 1918 play by Ethel Watts Mumford. It stars Wallace Reid, Bebe Daniels, Tully Marshall, John Steppling, Winifred Greenwood, Robert Bolder and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * *Sick Abed ; allmovie.com Category:1920 comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Sam Wood
title: Sick Abed
